title: Second-Hand Love Letter - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Love   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Doting Love Interests   Kind Love Interests   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Second Chance   Unconditional Love
author: 寒菽
description:
When Lu Yong was sixteen years old, he was good for nothing, gloomy, crippled, dim-witted, not good at talking, and a garbage collector who did not have any friends.

When Shen Wenqiu was sixteen years old, he’s popular, handsome, cheerful, a kind-hearted prince that’s favoured by everyone. 

When Lu Yong was twenty-eight years old, he was equipped with an advanced metal prosthetic arm. Starting from the small recycle centre at his house, he became a newly-appointed CEO for an electronics recycle group in the market, and was an outstanding gentleman in the industry. 

When Shen Wenqiu was twenty-eight years old, his parents’ business went bankrupt, he was left in a great debt, his friends and families left him. He had abandoned all his ideals and became a useless scum.>
